evidence.text: The policies and practices of Defendant outlined in paragraphs 9 through 29 constitute a pattern or practice of resistance to the full enjoyment by African Americans of the rights protected by Title VII.

add_extracted.value: pattern or practice of employment discrimination under Title VII

evidence.text: This action is brought on behalf of the United States to enforce Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e, et seq. ("Title VII").

add_extracted.value: Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e, et seq.

evidence.text: a. refrain from using written tests to screen and select applicants for DFD entry-level firefighter positions where such uses result in a disparate impact on African Americans, are not job related for the position in question and consistent with business necessity, and/or do not otherwise meet the requirements of Section 703(k) of Title VII, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e-2(k);

add_extracted.value: refrain from using written tests to screen and select applicants for DFD entry-level firefighter positions where such uses result in a disparate impact on African Americans, are not job related for the position in question and consistent with business necessity, and/or do not otherwise meet the requirements of Section 703(k) of Title VII, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e-2(k)

evidence.text: b. provide make whole remedial relief to all persons who have suffered individual loss as a result of the discrimination alleged in this Complaint;

add_extracted.value: provide make whole remedial relief to all persons who have suffered individual loss as a result of the discrimination alleged in this Complaint

evidence.text: c. adopt other appropriate nondiscriminatory measures to correct the present effects of its discriminatory policies and practices, including the use of entry-level firefighter selection procedures that comply with Title VII.

add_extracted.value: adopt other appropriate nondiscriminatory measures to correct the present effects of its discriminatory policies and practices, including the use of entry-level firefighter selection procedures that comply with Title VII
